sentence.Network_en: The delay is partly explicable by the road works.
sentence.Network_cn: 延误的部份原因是道路施工.

sentence.Network_en: The sudden increase in sales is easily explicable.
sentence.Network_cn: 销售额的突然增加是很容易理解的.

sentence.Network_en: The differences in the children's achievements were not wholly explicable in terms of their social backgrounds.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些孩子成绩方面的差异不能完全从社会背景来解释.

list.abs: The development of a tourism explication system of forest parks was recommended., 为森林公园的旅游解说系统的发展提出了一些建议.
The accelerator has been fruitfully combined to explicate economic dynamics ., 在用来阐述经济动态学的模型中 , 加速数一直同乘数卓有成效地结合在一起.

this paper explicates paste composition , kinds chooser rule , print and storage in SMT and introduces the test method of performance of solder .主要对SMT中焊膏的组成及焊膏性能检测方法进行了简要分析。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French, or from Latin explicabilis, from explicare (see explicate)

entry.def: If something is explicable, it can be explained and understood because it is logical or sensible.

example.ex: The older I grow, the stranger and less explicable the world appears to me.
example.tran: 年龄越大，世界对我而言就变得越陌生、越难理解。

means.word_mean: 1. capable of being explicated or accounted for;

auth_sentence.content: Everything is in principle explicable, for everything has a purpose.
auth_sentence.res_content: Everything is in principle explicable, for everything has a purpose.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Everything is in principle explicable, for everything has a purpose.

auth_sentence.content: The universe is observable and largely but not yet entirely explicable.
auth_sentence.res_content: The universe is observable and largely but not yet entirely explicable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The universe is observable and largely but not yet entirely explicable.

auth_sentence.content: He or she will only try to extend the precision of explicable.
auth_sentence.res_content: He or she will only try to extend the precision of explicable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He or she will only try to extend the precision of explicable.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =fold,表示"重叠,重复"; 2. 折; 3. 弯

stems_affixes.word_buile: complicate使..复杂+ed……的→adj.复杂的, 难解的
ex出+plic重叠,重复+able可以……的→能把重叠的东西弄出来→可解释的→explicate形容词
im进入+plic重叠+it→进入重叠→不直说→含蓄的
ac加强+com+plic重叠,重复+e→共同重叠在一起做事→同谋
complicate弄复杂+ion表名词→complication复杂,纠纷
com共同+plic重叠,重复+ity表名词→共同重叠→同谋的关系
re再+plic重叠,重复+a表名词→再重叠[一分]的[东西]→复制品
com全部+plic重叠,重复+ate使……→全部重叠起来→弄复杂
ex出+plic重叠,重复+ate使……→把重叠的东西弄出来→解释
ex出,往外+ploit=plic重叠+it→把折叠之物展开→使用

stems_affixes.value_cn: 牵连[于罪行中],含蓄表达
stems_affixes.word_buile: im进入+plic重叠,重复+ate表动词→[说话]进入重叠,不直说→含蓄表达
re再+plic重叠,重复+ate表动词→再重叠[一分]→复制

sentences.en: The delay is partly explicable by the road works.
sentences.cn: 延误的部份原因是道路施工。

sentences.en: The differences in the children’s achievements were not wholly explicable in terms of their social backgrounds.
sentences.cn: 那些孩子成绩方面的差异不能完全从社会背景来解释。

sentences.en: The sudden increase in sales is easily explicable.
sentences.cn: 销售额的突然增加是很容易理解的。
